sen.j: 丸太町駅（まるたまちえき）は京都府京都市にある駅。
sen.e: Marutamachi Station is located in Kyoto City, kyoto Prefecture.
Marutamachi Station is located in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Marutamachi stations are located in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 2つの駅が異なる場所に存在する。
sen.e: Two stations with the same name exist at different places with each other.
Two stations with the same name exist at different locations.
Two stations with the same name exist at different locations.

sen.j: 丸太町駅 (京阪) - 左京区にある京阪鴨東線の駅。
sen.e: Marutamachi Station (Keihan) - Located in Sakyo Ward, it is a stop on Keihan Oto Line.
Marutamachi Station (Keihan) - Located in Sakyo Ward, it's a stop on the Keihan Oto Line.
Marutamachi Station (Keihan) - Located in Sakyo Ward, it's a stop on the Keihan Oto Line.

sen.j: 2008年度に神宮丸太町駅へ改称される予定。
sen.e: In the autumn of 2008, it is scheduled that the name of this station is changed from Marutamachi Station to Jingu-marutamachi Station.
In the autumn of 2008, it is scheduled that the name of this station will be changed from Marutamachi Station to Jingu-marutamachi Station.
In the autumn of 2008, it is scheduled that the name of this station will be changed from Marutamachi Station to Jingu-marutamachi Station.

sen.j: 丸太町駅 (京都市営地下鉄) - 中京区にある京都市営地下鉄烏丸線の駅。
sen.e: Marutamachi Station (of Kyoto City Subway) - Located in Nakagyo Ward, it is a stop on the Karasuma Line, which is operated by Kyoto City Subway.
Marutamachi Station (of Kyoto City Subway) - Located in Nakagyo Ward, it's a stop on the Karasuma Line, which is operated by Kyoto City Subway.
Marutamachi Station (Kyoto Municipal Subway) - Located in Nakagyo Ward, it's a stop on the Karasuma Line, which is operated by Kyoto Municipal Subway.
